basic_information.scholarship_name: The Karen McGrath Scholarship for Special Education Majors
basic_information.committee_name: CEPS - Karen McGrath Scholarship for Special Educa

description: Scholarship Mission: To provide scholarship assistance to students within the College of Education & Professional Studies who are majoring in Special Education. Eligibility Requirements Must be a Special Education major 2.75 GPA or higher Must be an officer of the Student Council for Exceptional Children who demonstrates exemplary service to the organization Must have completed at least (30) hours or more Recipient must be enrolled in the required amount of hours in the upcoming fall and spring semesters in order to be eligible to receive this scholarship Selection Process Recipients of the scholarship will be selected by a departmental committee Award Requirements Must be enrolled in the upcoming fall and spring semester to receive award Attendance at an awards banquet is required for all recipients Recipients must write a thank you letter to the donors of the scholarship

general_criteria.description: Soft requirements that provide additional points/consideration

hard_criteria.description: Hard requirements that must be met to qualify for the scholarship
